      • useSecondaryConfig

        public void useSecondaryConfig(@Nullable
                               java.lang.String configName,
                               @Nonnull
                               java.io.File path)
        Register a secondary config located at the given path. You can override this if you want to change the default FileConfigBuilder used for the secondary configs.

        Overload of useSecondaryConfig(String, FileConfig) with a default builder.

        Parameters:
        configName - The name of the config that will be used to query it back.
        path - The path of the file, existing or not.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Thrown if the config has already been initialized.
        See Also:
        useSecondaryConfig(String, FileConfig), useSecondaryConfig(String, File)

      • useSecondaryConfig

        public void useSecondaryConfig(@Nonnull
                               java.lang.String configName,
                               @Nonnull
                               com.electronwill.nightconfig.core.file.FileConfig config)
        Directly register the given config with the given name. It will override other config files with this name after closing them.
        Parameters:
        configName - The name of the config that will be registered.
        config - The config file to register.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Thrown if the config has already been initialized.
        See Also:
        getSecondaryConfig(String)

      • loadConfigGroup

        public void loadConfigGroup(@Nullable
                            java.lang.String groupName,
                            @Nonnull
                            java.lang.String directory,
                            boolean recursive)
        See Also:
        loadConfigGroup(String, File, boolean, String), loadConfigGroup(String, String)

      • loadConfigGroup

        public void loadConfigGroup(@Nullable
                            java.lang.String groupName,
                            @Nonnull
                            java.io.File directory,
                            boolean recursive,
                            @Nonnull @RegEx
                            java.lang.String includePattern)
        Load a group of config files from a directory and eventually subdirectories. If recursive is true, the method will be recursively applied to all subdirectories. You can also provide a pattern that the file names need to satisfy (and not the directories) to be registered.

        The method useSecondaryConfig(String, File) is used to register the sub-configs and their name will be the group name plus the name of the subdirectory plus the name of the file with it's extension.

        The method getConfigGroup(String) can be used to retrieve them.

        Parameters:
        groupName - The name of the group. If null, will be the name of the directory.
        directory - The directory.
        recursive - If the subdirectories need to be loaded recursively.
        includePattern - A pattern to specify files to include.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the provided directory isn't a folder.
        DirectoryAccessDeniedException - If we can't create the directory.
        See Also:
        loadConfigGroup(String, String, boolean), addSecondaryConfigToGroup(String, FileConfig), getConfigGroup(String)

      • getConfigGroup

        public java.util.List<com.electronwill.nightconfig.core.file.FileConfig> getConfigGroup(@Nonnull
                                                                                        java.lang.String groupName)
        Get all of the FileConfig that belongs to que given group, = their name begin with the group name and is followed by a "." and the reste of the config name.
        Parameters:
        groupName - The name of the group to query.
        Returns:
        A list containing all of the FileConfig of the group.

                                      @Nonnull

        Overload of addSecondaryConfigToGroup(String, File).
        Parameters:

        path - The path to the config file.
        See Also:

      • addSecondaryConfigToGroup

        public void addSecondaryConfigToGroup(@Nonnull
                                      java.lang.String groupName,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      java.io.File path)
        This method is similar to addSecondaryConfigToGroup(String, FileConfig) and delegates to the method useSecondaryConfig(String, File) to save the file.
        Parameters:
        groupName - The name of the group that owns the config.
        path - Represent the path of the config file.
        See Also:
        useSecondaryConfig(String, FileConfig)

      • addSecondaryConfigToGroup

        public void addSecondaryConfigToGroup(@Nonnull
                                      java.lang.String groupName,
                                      @Nonnull
                                      com.electronwill.nightconfig.core.file.FileConfig config)
        Append a new config file to an existing or not, config group. This is an alternative to loadConfigGroup(String, File, boolean, String) when the config file isn't in the same folder or if the config is created procedurally.

        This method delegate to useSecondaryConfig(String, FileConfig).

        Parameters:
        groupName - The name of the group that owns this config.
        config - The actual config.
        See Also:
        loadConfigGroup(String, File, boolean, String)

      • getPrimaryConfig

        @Nonnull
public com.electronwill.nightconfig.core.file.FileConfig getPrimaryConfig()
        Get the main FileConfig
        Returns:
        The main config file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the module hasn't been initialized yet.
